javadoc: Query implementation used to test a field in a record to match a given value.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new FieldMatchQuery that tests a records field against a particular value.

params.name: column
params.comment: the field index in the record to test.

params.name: value
params.comment: the Field value to test the record's field against.

name: FieldMatchQuery
comment: Query implementation used to test a field in a record to match a given value.
